accessory.name: Parachute
accessory.description: Prevents the tank from taking falling damage. Parachutes must be enbabled before they are effective.

accessory.name: Repair Kit
accessory.description: A Kit used to re-charge tank life. (Batteries)

accessory.name: Survival Kit
accessory.description: Lives +1, and restores tank health to max.

accessory.name: Motor
accessory.description: Move instead of fire, basic fuel

accessory.name: Rocket Fuel
accessory.description: Jet Acceleration, used for moving out fast.

accessory.name: MLRS
accessory.description: Battle Fuel, will launch rockets from your tank as you move.

accessory.name: Radar
accessory.description: Repels projectiles away from your tank, upward.

accessory.name: EMP Field
accessory.description: Scrambles projectiles to pass around your tank.

accessory.name: Flak-Jacket
accessory.description: A Basic Solid Shield: it will protect from a single hit. Needs to be hit directly to be damaged.

accessory.name: Bomb Shelter
accessory.description: A Concrete Bunker. A medium strength solid shield.

accessory.name: Modern Armor Upgrade
accessory.description: The finest in solid armor. Strong.

accessory.name: Echo
accessory.description: A Basic Reflective Shield: it will protect from a single hit. Needs to be hit directly to be damaged.

accessory.name: Reactive Armor
accessory.description: Bouncy shield to repel incoming weapons.

accessory.name: Early Warning System
accessory.description: A Huge Shield to deflect incoming projectiles! Bouncy.

accessory.name: Tank Round
accessory.description: A single shell is fired from your tank, 1 hit kill possible.

accessory.name: Rocket
accessory.description: A single rocket is fired from your tank, 1 hit kill possible.

accessory.name: Main Cannon
accessory.description: Double Shells fired from your tank, 1 hit kill possible.

accessory.name: Tracer
accessory.description: A projectile leaves a marker at the final position. NO DAMAGE to enemy tanks. Extra Damage to shields.

accessory.name: TNT Bomb
accessory.description: A projectile leaves a marker at the final position. Delayed Explosion for dirt removal is created.

accessory.name: Explosive Tracer
accessory.description: A projectile leaves a marker at the final position. Delayed Explosion for dirt removal is created.

accessory.name: Heat-Seeking Maverick
accessory.description: Will seek out tanks before it detonates, aim is key to using this weapon.

accessory.name: Cruise Missile
accessory.description: A Projectile that is not affected by wind.

accessory.name: Hellcat Missile
accessory.description: A single missile is launched, and explodes into smaller bombs on impact which then also explode.

accessory.name: Shred Missiles
accessory.description: Missiles that cause extra damage to shields, very weak explosion

accessory.name: Anti-Armor Sabot
accessory.description: Explodes on impact, stronger than a basic shell.

accessory.name: Black Powder Bombs
accessory.description: Rolling bombs, drop them on opponents in holes.

accessory.name: Atomic Rollers
accessory.description: Bigger Rolling bombs, drop them on opponents in holes.

accessory.name: Gas Canisters
accessory.description: Chemical Rolling bombs, drop them on opponents in holes.

accessory.name: Phosphorus Bomb
accessory.description: Burning bomb, drop it on opponents in holes.

accessory.name: Cluster Shell
accessory.description: Fires a shell that bursts into mini bomblets on impact.

accessory.name: Cluster Barrage
accessory.description: Fires Several Cluster shells, when theese shells detonate they explode into mini bombs.

accessory.name: M-29 Cluster Mirv
accessory.description: On apex will split into several warheads that detonate on impact.

accessory.name: Flamethrower
accessory.description: A weapon that shoots a stream of flames. Any tanks near the flames will lose life rapidly if not shielded.

accessory.name: Agent Pink
accessory.description: Powerful Toxic Sludge is hurdled at the enemy. Agent Pink is effective in all enviroments.

accessory.name: Sulfuric Acid
accessory.description: Acid is dispersed in water. Acid erodes the landscape as it flows.

accessory.name: Bawoo Grenade
accessory.description: Fire a grenade which will bounce a couple times and explode

accessory.name: M-67 Frag
accessory.description: Fire a grenade which will bounce a couple times and explode

accessory.name: M-35 Thermal
accessory.description: Fire a grenade which will bounce a couple times and explode in napalm.

accessory.name: Tabun Gas Grenade
accessory.description: Fires a grenade that bounces and explodes into a chemical gas cloud damaging tanks in its radius.

accessory.name: roundlight
accessory.description: bolts in a ball shape,the damage is more concentrated on the middleand on the edge of the weapon radius.

accessory.name: Hydride Grenade
accessory.description: Toss a grenade that bounces and explodes into deadly electricity.

accessory.name: empdie
accessory.description: emp blast, wipes out shields within its radius

accessory.name: Flashbang Grenade
accessory.description: Fires a grenade that will cripple enemy shields, NO DAMAGE is done to the actual tank, just the shield.

accessory.name: EMP Pulse
accessory.description: Clears dirt, and enemy shields if close enough.

accessory.name: EMP Wave
accessory.description: Clears dirt, and enemy shields if close enough. Larger than EMP pulse.

accessory.name: Dragon Shell
accessory.description: A Large Napalm Weapon that bursts into smaller napalm globs.

accessory.name: Biochemical Shell
accessory.description: A Large chemical Weapon that sprays chemical globs.

accessory.name: Rocket Salvo
accessory.description: Several Missiles are fired from your tank.

accessory.name: Artillery Barrage
accessory.description: Several Artillery shells are fired from your tank.

accessory.name: Shake n' Bake
accessory.description: Several Rockets and Bombs are launched from your tank.

accessory.name: Incendiary Barrage
accessory.description: Fire Several Napalm bombs at the enemy.

accessory.name: Incendiary Salvo
accessory.description: Fire Several Napalm bombs at the enemy.

accessory.name: Toast n' Roast
accessory.description: Fire Several Cluster Shells and Napalm bombs at the enemy.

accessory.name: Sabot Barrage
accessory.description: Several Sabots are fired from your tank.

accessory.name: Machine Gun
accessory.description: Several shots are fired from your tank. Laserlike precision,and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: M-20 Bazooka
accessory.description: Heavy Armor Penetration. Laserlike precision,and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: Sniper Rifle
accessory.description: This rifle has the power to penetrate modern armor. Laser-like Precision and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: m230bullet
accessory.description: This rifle has the power to penetrate modern armor. Laser-like Precision and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: M230 Mini-Gun
accessory.description: AH-64 Apache 30mm Cannon. Laserlike precision,and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: Saiga
accessory.description: 2 Burst Shotgun. Laserlike precision,and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: Plasmoid
accessory.description: A rather small ball of plasma,can go through ground and tanks alike! The plasmoid has to touch the enemy tank to cause damage.

accessory.name: Javelin Rocket
accessory.description: One of the strongest Anti-tank weapons, Laserlike precision,and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: Desert Eagle
accessory.description: A 6 shot pistol. Laser-like Precision and 3x variable power.

accessory.name: Assault Rifle
accessory.description: Fire 3 bursts of bullets at your target.

accessory.name: thebigone
accessory.description: A huge atomic bomb with smoke mushroom

accessory.name: thebigone2
accessory.description: A huge atomic bomb with smoke mushroom

accessory.name: Tactical Nuclear Missile
accessory.description: Nuclear Missile, A large explosion will issue from its detonation point. Deadly to bouncy shields.

accessory.name: Radiation Nuke
accessory.description: The Ultimate Nuclear Weapon, after the initial blast, radiation ensues.

accessory.name: torpedolaunch
accessory.description: used by cruisers/destroyers, and certain aircraft.

accessory.name: Nuclear Warhead
accessory.description: Nuclear Warhead, A large explosion will issue from its detonation point. Deadly to most shields.

accessory.name: Mine-Sweeper
accessory.description: Forcibly detonate any mines on the field when you die.

accessory.name: Warthog Support
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will call in an air strike by an A-10 Warthog "tank killer".

accessory.name: Gunship Support
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will call in an air strike.

accessory.name: Carpet Bombing
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will call in an air strike.

accessory.name: Incendiary Bombing
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will call in an air strike.

accessory.name: Tank Airlift
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will transport you via air to the impact point.

accessory.name: Gator Mine System
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will call in an air strike to drop mines on the target. Mines drift with wind.

accessory.name: Bromide Drop
accessory.description: Chemical Warfare, Bomber disperses chemical agents into the air above the target.

accessory.name: Cluster Drop
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will call in an air strike.

accessory.name: Air-Strike
accessory.description: A stealth fighter fires rockets and bombs at the impact point.

accessory.name: V2 Guided Rocket
accessory.description: Send out a Smoke Grenade to have a V2 Launch from your tank.

accessory.name: MOAB Drop
accessory.description: Fires a smoke grenade that will call in an air strike.
